entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
